casebody.data:
Noel Arcenio SALDANA CASTILLO, petitioner,
v.
Jefferson B. SESSIONS, III, Attorney General. No. 17-1050. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2018.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Pereira v. Sessions, 585 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 2105, --- L.E.2d ---- (2018).
